column4: Does anyone know why I am not able to select a DVB device number (I.e., 0 or 1) in mythtv-setup?  It appears that kernel modules are loaded, but I don't have anything but "saa7146: register extension 'dvb'" when my system boots.
i'd check "dmesg | grep firmware" do you get any messages about missing?
ok, just checking.  best of luck.
